jd_information.description: Candidates can apply directly at (hrpinkytourtravels@rediffmail.com) mentioning post applied for in subject line.Job Location: Delhi-(Wazirpur Industrial Area) Near Netaji Subhash Place Metro StationBhopal-BHEL Awadhpuri, Phase 1, AwadhpuriKolkatta- BHEL ,Salt Lake City, Kolkata,Shift: Day Gender: Male Only Job Description:All Ticketing Activities:such as Issuance, Re-issuance, Re-validation, Cancellation and Refunds * Documenting all activities* Follow ups with customers and clients for existing reservations. *
